name: Ghastly (Couchlyntt)
description:
IN-BROWSER IS FUN AND FULLY PLAYABLE, HOWEVER, HAS POOR PERFORMANCE AND LACKS PARTICLES. FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE PLEASE DOWNLOAD. THANK YOU.

CONTROLLER SUPPORT AVAILABLE

Controls (description below)

F, E, R3 -> Pick up

Die -> Summon ghost

Your brain -> Solve puzzles

Arrow keys (Any direction!), Right stick any direction -> Shoot

R, Xbox B, Nintendo A, Playstation Circle -> Reset (IMPORTANT!)

 A S D / Left stick -> Move

Space / Xbox A, Playstation X, Nintendo B -> Jump

DESCRIPTION

After hearing about the wealth of riches in the abandoned temple, you head down. Preparing for anything, you bring a rocket launcher (that can send you flying!) with you, which you just have for some reason :)

Solve puzzles and test platforming skills in a very short-but-sweet Wowie! Jam 3.0 entry!

Created by me (Game designer, programmer, level designer), Hozefish (Animations, secondary artwork), and VeritasViii (Lead art)
